subject: IEEE BigData 2019 Call for Participations
body:
*2019 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (IEEE BigData 2019) (http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/ )* * Dec 9-12, 2019 **●** Los Angeles, CA, USA* The 2019 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (IEEE Big Data 2019) will be held in Los Angeles, CA, Dec 9-12, 2019 (*http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/ )*, we would like to invite you to join this exciting event. We will have a very high quality program. The highlights of the IEEE Big Data 2019 program are summarized as below (1) High quality technical program: 106 regular papers selected from 556 full paper submissions from 2057 authors and co-authors at 52 countries. (IEEE Big Data is a top-tier conference, regular paper acceptance rate has been less than 20% since its inception). (2) 5 confirmed keynote speeches by leading experts http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/KeynoteSpeech.html *· **Prof. Lise Getoor*: TBD · *Dr. Ramanathan Guha:* TBD *· **Prof. **Ling Liu*: Deception, Robustness and Trust in Big Data Fueled Deep Learning Systems · *Prof. J**udea Pearl :* The new science of cause and effect, with reflections on data science and artificial intelligence · *Prof. Yang Qiang: TBD* (3) IEEE Big Data 2019 Industry and Government program. 6 full session presentations, all the talks and discussions reflect perspectives from industry on how to address challenging big data issues relevant to industrial settings. (4) BigData Cup Challenges · Solar Flare Prediction from Time Series of Solar Magnetic Field Parameters · FEMH Voice Data Challenge 2019 · Suspicious Network Event Recognition · Real-time Machine Learning Competition on Data Streams · Understanding Multilingual Communities through Analysis of Code-switching Behaviors in Social Media Discussions · Brain Data Bank Challenge http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/BigDataCupChallenges.html (5) 44 workshops cover many emerging new research directions in big data http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/Workshops.html (6) 9 Tutorials, poster program etc. Tutorial 1: Process mining: Leveraging event data to understand and improve organizations Tutorial 2: Taming Unstructured Big Data: Automated Information Extraction from Massive Text Tutorial 3: Secure and Privacy-Preserving Big-Data Processing Tutorial 4: NewSQL : principles, systems and current trends Tutorial 5: An Overview of the Big Data Approaches for Profitable Social Network Analysis Tutorial 6: Large scale semantic graph data management and analytics Tutorial 7: Industrial AI: Machine Learning for Maintenance and Repair Tutorial 8: How to build and run a big data platform in the 21st century Tutorial 9: Deep Learning on Big Data with Multi-Node GPU Jobs http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/Tutorials.html Please register at *http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/Registration.html * The regular registration package includes three lunches, one banquet, coffee breaks, the conference proceedings and all the technical presentations (keynote, paper presentations , tutorials, posters, workshops. We also offer one-day registration too. To subscribe to this list, the user sends an email, with blank subject line, to listserv@lists.drexel.edu. In the text box, the user types: subscribe BIGDATA To unsubscribe from a list, the user sends an email to listserv@lists.drexel.edu with the message signoff BIGDATA ######################################################################## To unsubscribe from the BIGDATA list, click the following link: http://lists.drexel.edu/cgi-bin/wa?TICKET=NzM3Mzc5IGZvYWFkQENBTFBPTFkuRURVIEJJR0RBVEEgIA05eQkNGOMI&c=SIGNOFF

2019 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (IEEE BigData 2019) (http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/)

 Dec 9-12,  2019 ● Los Angeles, CA, USA

The 2019 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (IEEE Big Data 2019) will be held in Los Angeles, CA, Dec 9-12, 2019  (http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/), we would like to invite you to join  this exciting event. We will have a very high quality program. The highlights of the IEEE Big Data 2019 program are summarized as below 

(1)   High quality technical program:  106 regular papers selected from 556 full paper submissions from 2057 authors and co-authors at 52 countries.  (IEEE Big Data is a top-tier conference, regular paper acceptance rate has been less than 20% since its inception). 

(2)   5 confirmed keynote speeches by leading experts http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/KeynoteSpeech.html

·       Prof. Lise Getoor: TBD

·       Dr. Ramanathan Guha: TBD

·       Prof. Ling Liu: Deception, Robustness and Trust in Big Data Fueled Deep Learning Systems

·       Prof. Judea Pearl : The new science of cause and effect, with reflections on data science and artificial intelligence

·       Prof. Yang Qiang: TBD

 

(3)   IEEE Big Data 2019 Industry and Government program. 6 full session presentations,   all the talks and discussions reflect perspectives from industry on how to address challenging big data issues relevant to industrial settings. 

(4)   BigData Cup Challenges

·       Solar Flare Prediction from Time Series of Solar Magnetic Field Parameters

·       FEMH Voice Data Challenge 2019

·       Suspicious Network Event Recognition

·       Real-time Machine Learning Competition on Data Streams

·       Understanding Multilingual Communities through Analysis of Code-switching Behaviors in Social Media Discussions

·       Brain Data Bank Challenge

http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/BigDataCupChallenges.html

 

(5)   44 workshops cover many emerging new research directions in big data  http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/Workshops.html

(6)   9 Tutorials, poster program etc.

Tutorial 1: Process mining: Leveraging event data to understand and improve organizations  

Tutorial 2: Taming Unstructured Big Data: Automated Information Extraction from Massive Text

Tutorial 3: Secure and Privacy-Preserving Big-Data Processing  

Tutorial 4: NewSQL : principles, systems and current trends

Tutorial 5: An Overview of the Big Data Approaches for Profitable Social Network Analysis  

Tutorial 6: Large scale semantic graph data management and analytics  

Tutorial 7: Industrial AI: Machine Learning for Maintenance and Repair

Tutorial 8: How to build and run a big data platform in the 21st century

Tutorial 9: Deep Learning on Big Data with Multi-Node GPU Jobs

 

 

                     http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/Tutorials.html

Please register at

http://bigdataieee.org/BigData2019/Registration.html

The regular registration package includes three lunches, one banquet, coffee breaks, the conference proceedings and all the technical presentations (keynote, paper presentations , tutorials, posters, workshops.  We also offer one-day registration too. 




To subscribe to this list, the user sends an email,

with blank subject line, to
listserv@lists.drexel.edu. In the text box, the user
types: 

subscribe BIGDATA

To unsubscribe from a list, the user sends an email to
listserv@lists.drexel.edu with the message

 

signoff BIGDATA


To unsubscribe from the BIGDATA list, click the following link:
http://lists.drexel.edu/cgi-bin/wa?TICKET=NzM3Mzc5IGZvYWFkQENBTFBPTFkuRURVIEJJR0RBVEEgIA05eQkNGOMI&c=SIGNOFF
